page.title: 17Transport in Pevensey Area
page.content: The{Southdown buses serve}the Pevensey area.They are the{186,799 and 199.}The 799 goes from Worthing to Rye and the 186 goes from Eastbourne to Hailsham, via Pevensey Bay. The 199 only runs in the summer because it is an open top bus for holiday makers. {The railway station}mid-way between Pevensey and Pevensey Bay is ten minutes walk from either village. Trains only stop occasionally and don't link with the hourly bus times. The area is served by three private local{taxi services}of cars and a{mini {bus}which also takes children to school each day. {Age Concern}recently bought a{welfare {ambulance}paid for by public donation. It is for the house-bound as it holds 5 wheel-chairs.Unfortunately there is nowhere to garage it.
